snippet: The president’s 2014 budget includes $1.4 trillion in spending cuts and tax hikes over 10 years compared with current policies.
lead_paragraph: The president’s 2014 budget includes $1.4 trillion in spending cuts and tax hikes over 10 years compared with current policies.

headline.seo: Obama’s Mix of Taxes and Spending
